mapper.insert: insert into credit_card ( card_name, mno, card_number, expiry_date_month, expiry_date_year, cvc_code, pwd, used_date, reg_date ) values ( #{card_name}, #{mno}, #{card_number}, #{expiry_date_month}, #{expiry_date_year}, #{cvc_code}, #{pwd}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select cc.card_no, cc.card_name, cc.mno , concat(left(cc.card_number, 5), '****-****', right(cc.card_number, 5)) card_number , cc.expiry_date_month, cc.expiry_date_year , cc.cvc_code, cc.pwd, cc.used_date, cc.reg_date from credit_card cc, member m where cc.mno = #{mno} and cc.del_yn = 0 and cc.mno = m.mno order by cc.used_date desc
